item.title: By: chakira
item.dc:creator: chakira
item.description: This is a misreading of Marion. For Marion there is a valorization of the idol as a tool for shaping distanciation and appearance. The idol allows enough distance to apprehend the divine. Idols are not all bad in Marion, but there is another level beyond the fashioning process represented by the idol. They definitely feed in teleologically to what comes next.
